title: A Deep Learning Approach Towards Generating High-fidelity Diverse Synthetic Battery Datasets. (arXiv:2304.06043v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Recent surge in the number of Electric Vehicles have created a need to develop inexpensive energy-dense Battery Storage Systems. Many countries across the planet have put in place concrete measures to reduce and subsequently limit the number of vehicles powered by fossil fuels. Lithium-ion based batteries are presently dominating the electric automotive sector. Energy research efforts are also focussed on accurate computation of State-of-Charge of such batteries to provide reliable vehicle range estimates. Although such estimation algorithms provide precise estimates, all such techniques available in literature presume availability of superior quality battery datasets. In reality, gaining access to proprietary battery usage datasets is very tough for battery scientists. Moreover, open access datasets lack the diverse battery charge/discharge patterns needed to build generalized models. Curating battery measurement data is time consuming and needs expensive equipment. To surmount such l

Title: A Deep Learning Approach Towards Generating High-fidelity Diverse Synthetic Battery Datasets. (arXiv:2304.06043v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: Recent surge in the number of Electric Vehicles have created a need to develop inexpensive energy-dense Battery Storage Systems. Many countries across the planet have put in place concrete measures to reduce and subsequently limit the number of vehicles powered by fossil fuels. Lithium-ion based batteries are presently dominating the electric automotive sector. Energy research efforts are also focussed on accurate computation of State-of-Charge of such batteries to provide reliable vehicle range estimates. Although such estimation algorithms provide precise estimates, all such techniques available in literature presume availability of superior quality battery datasets. In reality, gaining access to proprietary battery usage datasets is very tough for battery scientists. Moreover, open access datasets lack the diverse battery charge/discharge patterns needed to build generalized models. Curating battery measurement data is time consuming and needs expensive equipment. To surmount such l
translated_title: 一种生成高保真度和多样化合成电池数据集的深度学习方法
translated_abstract: 近年来，电动汽车数量的激增创造了开发廉价高能量密度电池储存系统的需求。许多国家已经采取了具体措施来减少并随后限制由化石燃料驱动的车辆的数量。目前，基于锂离子电池的电池主导了电动汽车行业。能源研究也着重于对这些电池的状态进行准确计算，以提供可靠的车辆续航里程估计。虽然这种估算算法提供了精确的估计，但文献中所有现有技术都假定有优质电池数据集可用。事实上，电池科学家很难获得专有电池使用数据集。此外，开放访问数据集缺乏构建广义模型所需的多种电池充电/放电模式。整理电池测量数据很耗时，需要昂贵的设备。为了克服这种语言障碍和缺乏高质量电池研究数据集的问题，本文提出了一种用于生成多样化和高保真度合成电池数据集的深度学习方法。
tldr: 本文提出了一种用于生成多样化和高保真度合成电池数据集的深度学习方法，以解决获取高质量电池数据集的难题。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a deep learning approach for generating diverse and high-fidelity synthetic battery datasets to solve the problem of obtaining high-quality battery datasets.
